Jade FIDUCIAL is an accounting and tax firm that provides advisory and tax optimization services to French nationals and companies looking to establish themselves in the United States. Founded in 2003 by Olivier Sureau and Emmanuel Jaegle, the firm has offices in Paris and twelve locations across the U.S., including major cities like New York, Los Angeles, and Chicago. It is part of the FIDUCIAL network, which supports small and medium-sized enterprises in Europe.

The company offers a range of services tailored for French-speaking individuals and businesses. These include tax planning and preparation, financial management, accounting, bookkeeping, and specialized cross-border services. Jade FIDUCIAL focuses on helping clients navigate complex financial and tax environments, particularly those with international operations. Its expertise is designed to meet the specific needs of clients, providing comprehensive support for their financial and tax requirements.

Pro Bono Net is a national nonprofit organization based in New York City, founded in 1999 to enhance access to justice through technology and collaboration. With 25 years of experience, it develops scalable tools and programs aimed at bridging the justice gap for underserved communities.

The organization focuses on empowering individuals, equipping legal advocates, and mobilizing volunteers. It offers digital tools for self-help legal resources, training and practice guides for legal professionals, and specialized support for communities affected by natural disasters. Pro Bono Net also manages the Immigration Advocates Network, which provides immigration legal resources, and hosts state-specific platforms that serve as models for regional networks across the country. Its mission includes addressing legal barriers in disaster recovery and strengthening immigrant rights through comprehensive support and resources.

Short Description:
Advocates for Children of New York (AFC) is a nonprofit organization committed to ensuring equitable access to high-quality education for students in New York City who face systemic barriers. Founded in 1971 by education activists, AFC focuses on marginalized groups, including low-income students, those with disabilities, English Language Learners, homeless youth, and individuals involved in the child welfare or juvenile justice systems.

AFC employs a multi-faceted approach to tackle educational inequities. The organization provides free legal representation to families dealing with education-related disputes, conducts training programs for parents and educators, and engages in policy advocacy to reform education policies. Additionally, AFC participates in impact litigation to drive systemic changes that benefit underserved populations. The organization serves students, families, and educators, emphasizing direct intervention and systemic reform to improve educational outcomes.

Founded in 1952, it is one of the largest locally owned firms in the area, known for its commitment to professional services and community involvement. The firm is affiliated with several prestigious organizations, including the Government Audit Quality Center and the Public Company Accounting Oversight Board.

The firm provides a wide range of services, including audit services, tax planning and compliance, wealth planning, and forensic accounting. They also offer specialized services through the Brisbane Consulting Group, focusing on business valuation and litigation support. Duetti is a music financing, management, and marketing platform focused on the acquisition and monetization of music catalogs. The company provides transparent, data-driven deals that empower artists to monetize their music on their own terms. Duetti's mission is to democratize the music business, offering financial independence to music creators.

The company purchases catalog tracks, publishing rights, masters, and royalties from artists, enabling quick cash payments. Duetti also offers distribution and active catalog management services. With a marketing network that boasts over 2 million followers across various platforms, including YouTube, Duetti helps promote the music of its partnered artists. The company has collaborated with over 700 music creators in more than 30 countries, focusing on supporting independent artists and songwriters. 

Duetti has secured significant funding to enhance its operations and expand into publishing catalog deals, demonstrating its commitment to growth and strategic development. The company emphasizes transparency, flexibility, and artist independence, aiming to create a future where music creators have control over their careers.

Lafayette Square is a New York-based investment platform and private credit firm dedicated to fostering economic growth by supporting middle-market companies that create or preserve working-class jobs. Founded by Damien Dwin, the firm focuses on impact-driven investments, particularly in underserved communities and businesses employing individuals earning below 80% of the area median income.

The company offers a range of services, including direct lending, where it provides various types of financing to middle-market companies in the U.S. It operates Lafayette Square USA, Inc., a private Business Development Company (BDC) that seeks risk-adjusted returns through directly originated investments. Lafayette Square also emphasizes impact investing, allocating a significant portion of its capital to working-class communities and tracking job creation metrics. With a commitment to transparency, Lafayette Square publishes quarterly results on job metrics and capital commitments.

Short Description:
Milestone is a settlement trustee company based in Buffalo, NY, founded in 2012. The company focuses on optimizing post-settlement processes for law firms and their clients, particularly in complex cases such as single event, multi-party, and mass tort situations. Milestone is dedicated to ensuring prompt payments to claimants and operates with core values of integrity, personalization, efficiency, and compassion.

The company provides a variety of services to streamline the post-settlement process, including release administration, bankruptcy and probate coordination, and Qualified Settlement Fund (QSF) administration. Milestone's flagship product, Pathway, is a proprietary platform that digitizes the post-settlement process, helping claimants manage paperwork and providing real-time reporting for law firms. Additionally, Milestone offers trauma-informed settlement planning to assist claimants in navigating the financial and emotional aspects of their settlements.

Short Description:
Orderly Network is a decentralized finance (DeFi) infrastructure provider based in Nassau, Bahamas, founded in 2021. The company offers an omnichain liquidity layer that consolidates liquidity into a single, chain-agnostic order book, enhancing the efficiency of decentralized trading. With a total funding of $25 million, including a recent $5 million round, Orderly Network is positioned to bridge the gap between centralized exchanges and decentralized platforms.

The company provides a permissionless liquidity layer that aggregates assets across multiple blockchains, eliminating the need for wrapped assets. It also offers a software development kit (SDK) for builders, which includes tools for integrating decentralized applications (dApps) and supports both spot and derivatives trading. The $ORDER token plays a key role in governance, staking, and liquidity incentives, promoting decentralized operations and aligning stakeholder interests. Orderly Network serves a range of DeFi builders, including decentralized exchanges, aggregators, and high-frequency trading systems, focusing on overcoming liquidity fragmentation in the decentralized trading space.

The platform features a specialized database of accredited investors, allowing hedge fund managers to access potential investment opportunities.

The company provides weekly newsletters and daily updates to accredited investors, keeping them informed about industry developments and investment opportunities. Hedge Fund Community focuses on enhancing relationships between hedge fund professionals and qualified investors, supporting networking and information sharing in the financial services sector. With a dedicated team of fewer than 25 employees, the company has generated approximately $7.5 million in revenue.

Truv is a consumer-permissioned data platform that specializes in financial verification services. It offers solutions for income, employment, asset, and insurance verification, as well as direct deposit switching. The company serves a variety of clients, including mortgage lenders, consumer lenders, retail banks, and property management firms, focusing on cost savings and seamless integration with industry platforms.

As a credit reporting agency, Truv adheres to Fair Credit Reporting Act standards and maintains SOC2 Type II compliance for data security. It is the only consumer-permissioned Verification of Income and Employment (VOIE) platform accredited by both Freddie Mac and Fannie Mae, making it a trusted partner in the mortgage industry. Truv's services include payroll VOIE, asset verification, insurance validation, and tenant screening, all supported by robust technology and customizable reporting options.

Koyfin is a financial analytics platform founded in 2016 by Rob Koyfman and Rich. It provides live data and investment research tools designed for both individual and professional investors. The company has grown significantly, reaching 500,000 users globally by 2023, and operates with a team across the US, Argentina, Ukraine, and the UK.

Koyfin offers a range of services, including real-time analytics for equities, ETFs, mutual funds, forex, and bonds, along with social media sentiment tracking. Its analytical tools feature advanced charting, dashboarding, and model portfolio tracking. The platform operates on a freemium model, providing a free tier with essential features and paid plans for advanced tools. A mobile app launched in 2022 allows users to monitor markets on the go. Creative Business Inc. (CBI) is a business advisory firm based in Brooklyn's DUMBO neighborhood, specializing in financial and operational support for creative entrepreneurs and innovators. Founded in 2005, CBI focuses on empowering high-growth companies in various creative sectors, including art, design, media, retail, and light manufacturing.

CBI offers a range of services to help creative businesses succeed. These include financial planning, operational support, technology consulting, strategic human resources, and strategic advisory services. Short Description:
Domini Impact Investments LLC is a women-led, SEC-registered investment adviser that focuses on impact investing. Founded in 1997, the company aims to leverage finance to create positive outcomes for the planet and its people while pursuing competitive financial returns. Domini's mission is to empower investors to preserve the environment, inspire companies, and promote shared prosperity.

The company has a rich history in sustainable investing, marked by significant milestones such as the launch of the Domini 400 Social Index in 1990 and the introduction of the first socially and environmentally screened index fund in 1991. Domini offers a variety of investment products, including the Domini Impact Equity Fund, Domini Impact Bond Fund, and the Domini Sustainable Solutions Fund, all designed to align with social and environmental standards. Domini is also committed to community engagement and has been a founding signatory to the Principles for Responsible Investment since 2006.

Cerini and Associates, LLP is a full-service accounting firm founded in 1993 by Managing Partner Ken Cerini. The firm emphasizes personalized and creative accounting services, focusing on building strong client relationships. With a team of over 70 professionals and nine partners, Cerini & Associates combines the expertise of a large firm with the personal touch of a mid-sized practice.

The firm offers a comprehensive range of services, including assurance services, tax compliance and planning, operational reviews, merger and acquisition support, forensic accounting, and management consulting. Cerini & Associates serves various industries, such as healthcare, nonprofit, technology, special education, charter schools, school districts, construction, and startups. The firm is also dedicated to community engagement, providing free resources and webinars, and supporting literacy initiatives through partnerships.

CFO Squad LLC is a financial and business advisory firm based in New York, NY, with additional locations in Monsey, NY; Burlington, MA; Davao City, Philippines; and Central Israel. The company specializes in outsourced accounting and consulting services, catering to the financial needs of emerging to mid-sized companies across various industries, including manufacturing, distribution, retail, and bio-medical sectors.

Their service offerings include outsourced CFO advisory services, regulatory consulting, financial reporting, SEC and tax compliance, implementation of new accounting guidance, and audit preparation support. CFO Squad aims to provide expert financial solutions and guidance, helping clients navigate complex financial landscapes and achieve their business goals. The team consists of experienced professionals dedicated to enhancing financial management and compliance capabilities for both public and private companies.

Short Description:
LatinoJustice PRLDEF is a national nonprofit organization focused on advancing equity and justice for Latinx communities in the United States, Puerto Rico, and beyond. Founded in 1972 as the Puerto Rican Legal Defense and Education Fund, it was renamed in 2007 to reflect its broader mission. The organization aims to ensure political, economic, social, and educational equality for all Latino communities.

LatinoJustice PRLDEF provides various services, including legal advocacy, class action lawsuits, and leadership and legal education initiatives. It works to transform harmful systems through legal action and supports policies that promote bilingual education, affirmative action, and expanded rights for immigrants. The organization is committed to empowering communities and creating a more just society through its advocacy efforts.

Short Description:
Prometheum is a financial technology company established in 2017 by Wall Street attorneys. It focuses on integrating blockchain technology with traditional securities markets, serving as a market infrastructure provider for digital asset securities. The company operates through SEC-registered subsidiaries, offering a comprehensive ecosystem for trading, custody, and issuance of blockchain-native financial products.

Prometheum's services include an SEC-registered Alternative Trading System called Prometheum ATS, which provides access to digital asset securities with real-time settlement and advanced charting tools. It also offers Prometheum Capital, a special purpose broker-dealer and Qualified Custodian for secure storage of digital asset securities. The company supports the issuance of blockchain-native financial products, enabling the creation of securities on distributed ledgers for improved efficiency and liquidity.

With a strong emphasis on regulatory compliance, Prometheum targets retail investors, financial professionals, and institutions. The company recently secured $20 million in funding to expand its ecosystem, reinforcing its commitment to bridging blockchain innovation with regulated financial markets.

Short Description:
CIVIC Financial Services is a prominent private money lender based in Redondo Beach, California, specializing in financing for non-owner-occupied residential investment properties. Established in 2014, the company operates as a direct lender, managing the entire loan process to facilitate quick closings. CIVIC was acquired by PacWest Bancorp in 2021 and has been recognized as a top workplace by National Mortgage News.

CIVIC offers a range of financing solutions tailored for real estate investors, including bridge loans for property acquisition, fix-and-flip loans for purchasing and renovating properties, rehab financing for renovation costs, and long-term rental property loans. The company is dedicated to providing speed, reliability, and flexibility, catering to mortgage brokers, real estate investors, and agents across multiple U.S. states, including California, Nevada, Arizona, and Texas. CIVIC is a member of the American Association of Private Lenders and has received recognition as a Great Place to Work Certified organization.

Short Description:
Suris & Associates, P.C. is a law firm based in New York that specializes in personal injury law and real estate transactions. Established over a decade ago, the firm focuses exclusively on representing plaintiffs, helping injured individuals secure compensation while also managing complex real estate matters. With a team of 27 attorneys, the firm emphasizes client-centered representation, understanding the medical, financial, and emotional challenges faced by their clients.

The firm offers services in personal injury law, covering various case types such as car accidents, slip-and-fall injuries, and medical malpractice. They provide free consultations and aggressive settlement negotiations to assist clients with medical bills and lost wages. In real estate law, Suris & Associates handles residential and commercial closings, as well as disputes related to leasing and title issues. Their approach is built on compassionate counsel and a commitment to achieving substantial financial recoveries for their clients.

Short Description:
Palico is an online marketplace focused on the private equity sector. Founded by Antoine Dréan, the company aims to enhance transparency and efficiency in private equity transactions. It provides a digital platform for institutional investors to manage their investments effectively.

Palico offers two main services: a Secondary Platform for LP-led transactions, allowing buyers and sellers to trade fund interests, and a Primary Platform that connects Limited Partners (LPs) with General Partners (GPs). This enables LPs to discover private equity funds that align with their investment goals, while GPs can showcase their funds and portfolios to attract investors.

With over 1,400 accredited investors globally, Palico supports a diverse range of private and institutional investors. The company is also a registered broker-dealer with FINRA in the U.S., ensuring compliance with financial regulations.
